text.name: Cavernous Wailing
text.desc: If target has [Vibration], deal +(([Vibration] on target + [Vibration] Count on target)/2)% damage (max 20%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Cavernous Wailing
text.desc:
If target has [Vibration], deal +(([Vibration] on target + [Vibration] Count on target)/2)% damage (max <style="highlight">25%)
<style="highlight">- At 4+ highest Reson., deal +(5 + ([Vibration] on target + [Vibration] Count on target)/2)% damage instead (max 35%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">

text.name: Cavernous Wailing
text.desc:
If target has [Vibration], deal +(<style="highlight">5 + ([Vibration] on target + [Vibration] Count on target)/2)% damage (max <style="highlight">30%)
- At 4+ highest Reson., deal +(<style="highlight">7.5 + ([Vibration] on target + [Vibration] Count on target)/<style="highlight">1.5)% damage instead (max <style="highlight">40%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">

passiveList.name: Gloominess
passiveList.desc: When this unit uses a Skill to trigger [VibrationExplosion] on an enemy, inflict 1 [AttackDown] and 2 [DefenseDown] on the enemy next turn. (3 times per turn, including E.G.O Skills)
